package.name: opp_gui
package.description:
The opp_gui package contains the various files for the on- and off-line guis. The .ui files contain the visual layout, and are used to generate basic QT objects. The .h and .cpp files specify how those basic QT objects interact with each other and the rest of the system.
Most of the direct interaction with the ROS system is actually handled by the classes in the opp_application package. The GUI objects own a copy of an application object, and pass user input down into the ROS system.
package.author: mripperger
